trending.title: Oppenheimer
trending.description: A dramatization of the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the creation of the atomic bomb.

popular.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
popular.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora.

top_rated.title: The Shawshank Redemption
top_rated.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.
